function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High cost and maintenance needs discourage green roof installation.","Impact":"Reduced adoption of green roof systems, leading to limited access to vegetation in homes.","Mitigation":"Reduce the cost and maintenance requirements of green roof systems.","Technologies":"Low-maintenance green roof materials, cost-effective construction techniques.","People":"Homeowners, residents.","Owner":"Construction companies, urban planners, local governments."},{"Description":"Confinement conditions impact perception and willingness to pay for green areas.","Impact":"Limited willingness to invest in green areas, leading to lower access to natural spaces at home.","Mitigation":"Promote the mental and physical health benefits of green areas and green roof systems, even in confinement conditions.","Technologies":"Biophilic design, virtual tours of green roof installations.","People":"Respondents, homeowners, urban planners.","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations, local governments."}]}
